name: Renko has too much fun drawing on poor dreaming Maribel's face
name_original: Renko has too much fun drawing on poor dreaming Maribel's face
description:
Maribel snores too loud, Renko can't sleep, go prank her face

Controls:

  • Keyboard:
    Arrow keys: Navigate UI / Paint
    Spacebar: Approach (and Accept)
  • Controller:
    D-Pad : Navigate UI / Approach
    A: Accept.
    A/B/X/Y: Paint

Be stealthy and don't let Maribel suss you out

Credits:

@FerdysLab (Art, Programming)
@SlascoplerdSorasu (Art, SFX)
@SlowBro (Music)
